description: Aspose.Tasks is a class library for working with Microsoft Project files. Using Aspose.Tasks for .NET you can work with MPP, MPT, XML, XLSX, HTML, PDF, XAML and other formats in your applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

    Features

    TASKS-33177 Reading specific view data from MS Project MPP files. 
    TASKS-33581 Read Group definition data from mpp 2003 files.
    TASKS-33579 Read table data from mpp 2003 files.
    TASKS-33578 Read filter definition data from mpp files.
    TASKS-33587 Read specific gantt chart view data for 2007 file format.
    TASKS-33586 Read view data from mpp 2013.
    TASKS-33585 Read view data from mpp 2010.
    TASKS-33583 Read view data from mpp 2007.
    TASKS-33580 Read Filter Criteria data.
    TASKS-33577 Read view data from mpp 2003.
    TASKS-33392 Read specific gantt chart view data for 2003 file format.
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
